field.name: summary
field.value: It is impossible to use bound lifestyle with chain of components binding to innermost one

field.name: description
field.value:
The following scenario is not working:
ViewModel1 -Foo -ViewModel2 -Foo -Bar -Foo
If Foo is bound to innermost viewModel then ViewModel2 and Bar should share the same instance of Foo but it should be different than the one ViewModel1 has. This currently doesn't work, even if the predicate picks the correct ViewModel as root of the scope.
